attributes.action: Allow care workers to faciliate the provision of sex surrogates for people with disabilities, whether physical or mental.  Including mental illness.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sexuality and its expression is a human right for all consenting adults, including those with a disability. Non- voluntary celibacy is injurious to physical and mental health. The sex surrogates, which would include specially trained prostitutes, would be respected as a part of the care team.  Those clients holding their on care funds could use this to pay for sex surrogates.
